description: Updates the Authentication / Authorization settings associated with web app.

resource_group_name.description: Name of the resource group to which the resource belongs.

slot.description: Name of web app slot. If not specified then will default to production slot.

site_auth_settings.description: Auth settings associated with web app.

subscription_id.description: Your Azure subscription ID. This is a GUID-formatted string (e.g. 00000000-0000-0000-0000-000000000000).
